Package com.techelevator.tenmo.services

Class AccountService

java.lang.Object
com.techelevator.tenmo.services.AccountService
public class AccountService extends Object
This class's APIs contain details necessary for retrieving data from the Account table and securely passing it to the View.
Author:
Jayden Southworth, Kadeam Howell

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AccountService(String baseUrl)
    This constructor is used to initialize the REST template and pass the server's URL and the specified endpoint to subsequent APIs.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Account
    getAccountById(AuthenticatedUser authenticatedUser, int accId)
    This API uses the HttpEntity API to retrieve the token passed by the authenticatedUser object, then returns an account based on the passed-in account ID.

    This API uses the HttpEntity API to retrieve the token passed by the authenticatedUser object, then returns accounts associated with the passed-in user ID.

  • Constructor Details

    • AccountService

      public AccountService(String baseUrl)
      This constructor is used to initialize the REST template and pass the server's URL and the specified endpoint to subsequent APIs.

  • Method Details

    • getBalance

      public double getBalance(AuthenticatedUser authenticatedUser)
      This API uses the HttpEntity API to retrieve the current user, and the user's token passed by the authenticatedUser object.
      Parameters:
      authenticatedUser - Retrieves the current user and associated details, as well as the authentication token.
      Returns:
      the current account's balance.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.client.RestClientResponseException - Throws an exception if RestClient cannot process the request due to an issue from the client.
      org.springframework.web.client.ResourceAccessException - Throws an exception if connection to the server is disturbed.

    • getAccountByUserId

      public Account getAccountByUserId(AuthenticatedUser authenticatedUser, int userId)
      This API uses the HttpEntity API to retrieve the token passed by the authenticatedUser object, then returns accounts associated with the passed-in user ID.
      Parameters:
      authenticatedUser - Retrieves the authentication token.
      userId - Takes a passed-in user ID and appends it to the endpoint.
      Returns:
      accounts associated with the passed-in user ID.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.client.RestClientResponseException - Throws an exception if RestClient cannot process the request due to an issue from the client.
      org.springframework.web.client.ResourceAccessException - Throws an exception if connection to the server is disturbed.

    • getAccountById

      public Account getAccountById(AuthenticatedUser authenticatedUser, int accId)
      This API uses the HttpEntity API to retrieve the token passed by the authenticatedUser object, then returns an account based on the passed-in account ID.
      Parameters:
      authenticatedUser - Retrieves the authentication token.
      accId - Takes a passed-in account ID and appends it to the endpoint.
      Returns:
      an account associated with the passed-in account ID.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.client.RestClientResponseException - Throws an exception if RestClient cannot process the request due to an issue from the client.
      org.springframework.web.client.ResourceAccessException - Throws an exception if connection to the server is disturbed.
